message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for a product worth $12,000 to me. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're offering, I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to come down to $10,500?  I'm really interested in your product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I can't go all the way down to $10,500, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,750? That's a great price for both of us.
